casebody.data:
ASHFORD
v.
WAL-MART. No. 211P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. J.D. Prather, Michael W. Ballance, Raleigh, for Wal-Mart, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of April 2005 by Plaintiff for "Appeal Notice - Petition for Rehearing":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
